content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Facility at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
- Copper Furnace (Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) used for smelting copper ore into copper plates

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API Misuse
  - Avoid using unrecognized keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) and extra positional arguments. Verify the function signature before invocation to ensure only supported parameters are passed.
  
• Lab Placement and Crafting Issues
  - Ensure that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map.
  - Check for None when retrieving entities (such as Labs) to prevent iteration over a NoneType.
  
• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages
  - Confirm that all sub-ingredients are obtainable before crafting a Lab. Errors indicate shortages in items needed for iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables.
  - Verify resource counts (e.g. sufficient iron-plates and copper-plates) to meet the recipe requirements for all Lab components.
